project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install required libraries
Implement functionality to fetch current weather data from the public API
Parse the weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement functionality to display the extracted information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather fetching and parsing functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure correctness and reliability
